name: Spike Hell
description:
Endless runner inspired by vvvvvv's reverse gravity mechanic made with the Godot game engine. You play as  Spike and you have to avoid the spikes on the floor and ceiling by reversing gravity.

Controls

Click to "jump" or reverse gravity

A/ D or left /right arrow keys for left or right movement

I also made a Sega Genesis/Mega Drive version that you can play on any emulator and probably the console itself. The SG/MD port isn't an exact copy of the Godot one and it lack some mechanic  as ( gradually speed up the spikes every 30 points). That maybe in the future I will improve, if I get more experience with the SGDK library

Controls for SG/MD

BTN A - Jump or Reverse Gravity

D-PAD to move left or right

Font : https://tinyworlds.itch.io/free-pixel-font-thaleah

Music: https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle
